志操堅固: (しそうけんご) - (yoji) being faithful to one's principles; being of firm purpose and deep commitment; constancy; true blue
志望動機: (しぼうどうき) - reason for (one's) application (esp. to a company)
志望校: (しぼうこう) - school of one's (first, second) choice
志望理由書: (しぼうりゆうしょ) - statement of purpose; essay-letter in university application form
志集: (ししゅう) - booklet of essays; magazine
忘れかける: (わすれかける) - to start forgetting
忘れがち: (わすれがち) - forgetful; oblivious of; negligent
忘れな草: (ワスレナグサ) - forget-me-not (esp. the water forget-me-not, Myosotis scorpioides)
忘れな草色: (わすれなぐさいろ) - forget-me-not blue
忘れられない: (わすれられない) - unforgettable; memorable; haunting; indelible
忘れられる: (わすれられる) - to slip into obscurity; to be forgotten
忘れる: (wasureru) - esquecer, deixar descuidadamente, ser esquecido em relação a, esquecer-se de, esquecer (um objeto)
忘れ勝ち: (わすれがち) - forgetful; oblivious of; negligent
忘れ去る: (わすれさる) - to forget completely; to leave behind
忘れ形見: (わすれがたみ) - memento (from a dead person)/souvenir/keepsake; orphan/posthumous child
忘れ扇: (わすれおうぎ) - discarded fan (in autumn); forgotten fan
忘れ物: (わすれもの) - lost article; something forgotten
忘れ緒: (わすれお) - decorative gauze strap that hangs from the front left side of the kohimo when tying closed one's hanpi
忘れ草: (わすれぐさ) - Hemerocallis fulva var. kwanso (variety of daylily); tobacco
忘れ霜: (わすれじも) - late frost; frost in late spring
忘八: (ぼうはち) - customer at a brothel/john/someone who has forgotten the eight virtues; brothel/owner of a brothel
忘却: (ぼうきゃく) - lapse of memory; forgetfulness; oblivion
忘己利他: (もうこりた) - selflessness; selfless devotion to the service of others
忘年: (ぼうねん) - forgetting the hardships of the old year; forgetting one another's age difference
忘年会: (bounenkai) - festa de fim de ano, festa para esquecer o ano, bōnenkai
忘恩行為: (ぼうおんこうい) - act of ingratitude
忘緒: (わすれお) - decorative gauze strap that hangs from the front left side of the kohimo when tying closed one's hanpi
忙がしい: (いそがしい) - busy; hectic; occupied; engaged
忙しい: (isogashii) - ocupado, atarefado, agitado; inquieto, apressado, inquieto
忙しげ: (せわしげ) - looking busy; appearing busy; looking restless
忙しない: (せわしない) - restless; fidgety; in a hurry
忙を厭わず: (ぼうをいとわず) - despite one's busyness
忙中: (ぼうちゅう) - (in the midst of) busyness
忙中有閑: (ぼうちゅうゆうかん) - (yoji) having free time to spare in the midst of busyness; leisure in the intervals of one's work
忙中閑有り: (ぼうちゅうかんあり) - find odd moments of leisure in one's busy life
忙殺: (ぼうさつ) - being extremely busy; being swamped with work
忙殺される: (ぼうさつされる) - to be worked to death; to be very busily occupied
応: (ou/kota) - respond , agreement, affirmative; aye, yes, OK, okay, yeah, all right
応える: (こたえる) - (応える, 報える only) to respond/to answer/to meet (e.g. demands, expectations); (sometimes 堪える)  to affect/to take a toll/to strike home/to have an effect on/to be hard on someone (e.g. heat, cold, work, illness, etc.)/to be a strain
応じて: (おうじて) - in proportion to; according to; depending on
応じる: (おうじる) - to respond; to satisfy; to accept; to comply with; to apply for
応ずる: (おうずる) - to answer/to respond/to meet; to satisfy/to accept
応供: (おうぐ) - arhat (meritorious person, esp. an epithet of Buddha)
応分: (おうぶん) - according to one's abilities; appropriate; reasonable
応力: (おうりょく) - stress (e.g. on a mechanical part); tension
応力径路: (おうりょくけいろ) - stress path
応力経路: (おうりょくけいろ) - stress path
応力腐食: (おうりょくふしょく) - stress corrosion
応力腐食割れ: (おうりょくふしょくわれ) - stress corrosion cracking
応募: (oubo) - application, subscription, entry (competição, rifa, etc.), enlistment
応募作品: (おうぼさくひん) - work sent to a competition; competition entry
応化: (おうけ) - assumption of a suitable form (by a buddha or bodhisattva)
応召: (おうしょう) - respond to a call for military service; being called to the colours (colors)
応召兵: (おうしょうへい) - conscript; draftee; selectee; inductee
応変能力: (おうへんのうりょく) - (yoji) ability to take proper steps to meet the situation; ability to adapt oneself to (the requirement of) the moment
応天門: (おうでんもん) - main southern gate of the Heian Palace's reception compound
応天門の変: (おうてんもんのへん) - Otenmon conspiracy (political incident in 866CE centered around the destruction by fire of the main gate of the imperial palace)
応安: (おうあん) - Ouan era (of the Northern Court) (1368.2.18-1375.2.27)
応急修理: (おうきゅうしゅうり) - temporary repairs
応急処置: (おうきゅうしょち) - emergency measure/emergency procedures/first-aid treatment; temporary repairs/stop-gap treatment
応急手当てを施す: (おうきゅうてあてをほどこす) - to give (a person) first-aid; to administer first aid
応急手当を施す: (おうきゅうてあてをほどこす) - to give (a person) first-aid; to administer first aid
応急措置: (おうきゅうそち) - (yoji) stopgap measure; quick-fix solution
応急攻撃: (おうきゅうこうげき) - hasty attack
応急策: (おうきゅうさく) - emergency or temporary measure
